description.zh: SearXNG 是一个尊重隐私、可定制的元搜索引擎，能够从多个来源聚合搜索结果。它允许用户在不被追踪的情况下匿名搜索网络。用户可在 searx.space 找到现成可用的实例。
description.en: SearXNG is a privacy-respecting and customizable metasearch engine that aggregates results from multiple sources. It allows users to search the web anonymously without tracking. Ready-to-use instances are available at searx.space.

feature.zh:
## 产品优势:

- 尊重用户隐私，不追踪搜索行为
- 高度可定制，适合开发者和高级用户
- 提供现成可用的在线实例，便于快速使用

## 功能列表:

- 聚合多个来源的搜索结果
- 提供维护良好的 Docker 镜像（支持 ARM64 和 ARM/v7 架构）
- 提供安装脚本和详细的安装指南
- 通过 Weblate 支持社区驱动的翻译
- 配套开发快速入门指南，便于贡献代码
- 支持通过 GitHub Codespaces 进行浏览器端开发
feature.en:
## Benefits:

- Respects user privacy and does not track search behavior
- Highly customizable for developers and advanced users
- Provides ready-to-use online instances for easy access

## Features:

- Aggregates search results from multiple sources
- Available as a well-maintained Docker image (including ARM64 and ARM/v7 support)
- Offers installation scripts and detailed setup guides
- Supports community-driven translations via Weblate
- Easy contribution process with development quickstart guides
- Compatible with GitHub Codespaces for browser-based development
